§oQuite the Gold cost?§r

Now that you have §aEpoxy§r, you can make §aAdvanced Circuit Boards§r! The next Circuit tier is so close.

§9Tips:§r
Consider using §dElectrotine decomposition§r and §dOre Processing§r for §eElectrum§r.
Consider using the §3Chemical Bath§r with §dMercury§r for §eGold§r, from a wide variety of ores.
